类 ShipList

java.lang.Object
  ShipList

public class ShipList
extends java.lang.Object

A simple modle of a list of ships.The ShipList class will specify the attributes and behaviours of all the ships within the game.

版本：
1.0
作者：
Haoyu Zhang

构造方法摘要
ShipList()
          Create a ShipList with default constructor.
ShipList(java.util.ArrayList<Ship> ships)
          Create a ShipList with non-default constructor.

构造方法详细信息

ShipList

public ShipList()
Create a ShipList with default constructor.

ShipList

public ShipList(java.util.ArrayList<Ship> ships)
Create a ShipList with non-default constructor.

参数：
ships - A list of ships.
方法详细信息

addShip

public void addShip(java.lang.String shipName,
                    int xPos,
                    int yPos,
                    int noOfHitsMade,
                    int noOfHitsNeeded)
Add a new Ship object to the ShipList.

参数：
shipName - The name of the ship.
xPos - The x coordinate of the ship,which indicate which line the ship is in the grid.
yPos - The y coordinate of the ship,which indicate which row the ship is in the grid.
noOfHitsMade - The number of hits the ship takes.
noOfHitsNeeded - The number of hits needed to destory the ship.

displayGrid

public void displayGrid(int gridSize,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Ship> ships)
Display all ship on a grid."O" means ship is undamaged,"D" means ship is damaged,"X" means ship is destroyed.

getNumberOfShips

public int getNumberOfShips()
Get the number of ships stored in this shiplist.

返回：
The x coordinate of the ship.

getShipByIndex

public Ship getShipByIndex(int index)
Get a ship object using its index.

返回：
A ship object.

getShipList

public java.util.ArrayList<Ship> getShipList()
Get a list of ships.

返回：
A list of ships it's store.

ifWin

public boolean ifWin(java.util.ArrayList<Ship> ships)
Check the state of the shiplist, and therefore to tell the result if the player or the computer is win this game.

参数：
ships - The shiplist you want to know whether all ships in this shiplist has been destroyed.
返回：
True if all ships in this shiplist has been destroyed,which means another side wins.

setShipList

public void setShipList(java.util.ArrayList<Ship> ships)
Set the list of ships.

参数：
ships - A list of ships.
